summary: This document consists of sign-in sheets for staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center's Special Housing Unit (SHU) for the third quarter of 2019, along with a post order for the Operations Lieutenant from December 2018. It details routine prison administrative procedures and staff assignments during the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

events.title: Start of Q3 SHU Staff Sign-in Period
events.description: Beginning of the third quarter (6/9/2019 - 9/7/2019) for which SHU staff sign-in sheets were maintained.

events.title: Operations Lieutenant Post Order Issued
events.description: Post orders for the Operations Lieutenant at the Metropolitan Correctional Center were issued, detailing shift responsibilities and equipment.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document contains administrative sign-in sheets for the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, for Q3 2019 (6/9/2019 - 9/7/2019).
It includes a post order for the Operations Lieutenant dated December 7, 2018, detailing shift duties from 12:00 A.M. to 8:00 A.M.
The SHU sign-in sheets are standard prison administrative forms (PS 5500.14) used to track staff presence.
The document period (mid-2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center prior to his death in August 2019.
No specific individuals are named in the legible portions of the provided text; staff names appear to be handwritten and largely illegible or redacted in the sample.
